comment: She was an incredibly easy teacher. You only write one paper all semester and spend the entire semester doing research and different parts for that paper. She is a bit of a slow grader but honestly, the class was not difficult. Just put in your effort and you will be fine. She does have attendance questions every week but it's a "yes or "no" thing

I love this professor, she's so sweet and caring, and she's very lenient with everything. A lot of writing assignments but she's an easy grader which makes it easier to do them. She is very harsh with participation, and she expects everyone to participate in everything. Would definitely take her again though. Two major final projects.

Professor Hill's  English 1101 course was amazing. As a professor she helped students out in a way that  would help them excel in the class and was very clear and had great lectures. There was never a moment where assignments or directions were unclear. Overall great class, professor, and environment!

The best professor ever. She is SO sweet and caring! Not to mention hilarious. I took her for 1101 & 1102 English my freshman year and aced both classes. Her assignments are well thought out and spaced well enough to give you more than enough time to complete. She even wrote me a recommendation letter for me for a scholarship I won. Take her class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Overall great professor, she has made this course enjoyable while always having a positive attitude. If I could take this class again I would as every assignment has been spaced out evenly giving people enough time to work and finish what needs to be done.

Attendance is mandatory as most her assignments revolve around what is discussed in class; Makes class enjoyable to attend, and she gives a lot of time to complete them and has a policy around late work. Super clear grading and understanding. TAKE HER!!

Take her, she is passionate about what she is teaching. She's young and has a great attitude it's like being taught by a peer, very comfortable environment, she is cool. The class is easy, just show up and do the assignments which she gives a lot of time to complete them.

I took Professor Hill last semester and she was an amazing teacher. She ensured that everybody always knew what they were doing and had us do peer reviews to ensure that. She also loves to make her students laugh and participate. Her courses are more on the writing side but she is 105% worth taking. If you want to pass English TAKE HER.
